name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the game, a collapsed Chinese fan cried and said, "You can't beat them, but you can kick them, right?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Seven shames and great humiliations! The Chinese national football team slapped the faces of Chinese fans with its strength
It is reported that the Chinese national football team broke several records at the same time: the most goals conceded in a single game in the World Cup qualifiers; the biggest score loss in the World Cup qualifiers; the biggest score loss in the history of the Chinese national football team against Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the World Cup qualifiers, the Chinese national football team lost 0:7 to Japan. Asian Footballer of the Year Fan Zhiyi said during the live broadcast: Oops! The scoreboard only had 6 points!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Due to the recent incident of a school bus crashing into students in Tai'an, Shandong, a place in Jiangsu Province has stopped running school buses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On August 31, adult self-taught examinations across the country suddenly announced that this year they would add an exam for "An Outline of Xi Jinping's Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era", catching the candidates off guard.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen said that he was studying abroad, and as the National Day was approaching, he was asked by the community to shoot a video to wish the country prosperity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a retired soldier of the Rocket Force reported under his real name that Li Hong (sound), the younger brother of Li Jun, the deputy commander of the Rocket Force, violated discipline and law, engaged in corruption, damaged the political ecology, and posed a hidden danger to national security. Li Hong was accused of taking over the business of the Rocket Force and other troops through his wife Xie, making a lot of money, buying and selling positions in the army, and commanding officers to do things for him without a military position.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, staff members in the system across the country have complained about being forced to donate money on September 9th, the "99 Charity Festival". Some people questioned that they could not find any financial reports of the so-called "99 Charity Festival" on the Internet, and they did not know where the money went.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the media reported that a Chongqing woman born in the 1990s was prosecuted for suspected provoking trouble because she worked part-time as a petitioner on behalf of others to report the delayed delivery and quality issues of Chongqing Sunac Yinxi Xiaoyuan. She was sentenced to one year and six months in prison with a two-year reprieve.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Civil servants in Wendeng, Weihai, Shandong, revealed on Xiaohongshu that their current salary is "maintaining 4 and striving for 6", and only one month's salary is paid in a quarter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, leaders of many African countries praised China-Africa cooperation on social media platforms and thanked the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation for providing a valuable platform for exchanges and cooperation among countries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In Jintan, Changzhou, local grid workers go door to door to persuade people to donate
There is no requirement for the amount, but they will not give up persuading people if they don't donate

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shenzhen, Guangdong, parents complained that the food at Longgang Hongyang School was too bad, and the school did not allow parents to bring meals to their children, forcing students to sit on the ground outside the classroom to eat. The school said: Parents are allowed to bring meals, but meals ordered from outside the school cannot be brought into the classroom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, a netizen posted a video asking: Why didn't we have people like Galileo, Newton, and Watt in the Ming Dynasty? To this, the netizen replied, "They are nothing in front of the Yongle Encyclopedia" and "Because the Yongle Encyclopedia gave birth to people like Newton, Galileo, and Watt."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 6 (Release) A man wearing a cosplay costume was accused by a passing auntie of wearing Japanese clothes.
The man and his entourage responded, "Why do you say these are Japanese clothes? What evidence do you have?" "Everyone hates the Japanese" "Their clothes are not even worn by dogs."
He retorted to the auntie, "Then the clothes you are wearing are French!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens explain how grassroots police deal with excessive self-defense

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Zhanjiang, Guangdong. A delivery boy exposed the poor hygiene of a nourishing chicken takeaway shop in Xiashan District. The chicken was piled in the toilet and the boss processed the chicken in the toilet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is said online that the man once posted on his WeChat Moments: When walking on the road, the Japanese are all scared!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5 (Released) Anhui Hefei. A video posted by a netizen said that the mother had brought two certificates of deposit of 75,000 and 53,000 respectively to Huishang Bank last year to merge, but the teller "swallowed the money" and only gave the mother a certificate of deposit of more than 10,000. The mother did not verify it at the time, and later found that she could not find a solution after contacting 12345 and the bank. The mother was so anxious that she broke down and cried in the bank.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, after the Chinese national football team lost 0-7 to Japan in the World Cup qualifiers, many fans flocked to the comment section of Li Tie's Weibo to leave messages such as "Laotie, I miss you" and "Hurry up, Tiezi, let him out."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Suzhou, Jiangsu. It was reported online that a child near Haishang Yipin Community was using a large crossbow to hunt cats. In the video, the child holding the crossbow said, "I kill cats for fun. I have hunted one before, but I am not sure if it is dead."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Chinese national football team lost 0-7 to Japan in the World Cup qualifiers, some netizens said, "What does it matter if Japan wins the football game? No country that is good at football is doing well. Argentina won the World Cup, but the country went bankrupt." Other netizens said, "What's the point of Japan being good at football? China can still beat Japan in diving and table tennis."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 4, Jiangsu. A woman claimed to have found a tooth in a fresh meat mooncake she bought at Sam's Club. The staff responded: We are already dealing with it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Shangrao, Jiangxi. It was reported online that the Civil Affairs Bureau of Guangfeng District issued a notice requiring section-level cadres to donate more than 200 yuan, and ordinary cadres and employees also need to donate more than 100 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Compulsory education in Xiaodian District, Taiyuan City, Shanxi Province has started to charge fees. The Education Bureau has moved the afternoon school dismissal time forward by 2 hours, changing the original 4-6 o'clock to "after-school service" and charging parents.
Many parents have not finished get off work two hours in advance, and it is impossible for them to pick up their children so early, and they are afraid that their children will fall behind in class. It is almost the same as compulsory education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 6, Xiamen. After a couple went through divorce procedures at the Gulangyu Branch of the Siming District Court, the husband suddenly took out a folding knife from his bag and stabbed his wife in the head while waiting for the boat at the dock. She was later rescued by the surrounding police and residents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the past two days, many Shanghai residents reported that their electricity bills in August increased sharply compared with previous years. Some people even posted electricity bills of 4,000 yuan, and some netizens questioned whether the surge in electricity bills was caused by remote meter adjustment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, the President of Namibia said: "When we talk about development, we cannot do without China. The common progress of China and Africa will allow us to live a life that our great-grandparents could not have imagined." Netizens responded, "It's all the money our school uses to install air conditioners for our children."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Xiamen, Fujian. During the Urban Management Law Enforcement, an uncle stood up to speak for the vendors: "It is not easy for them to run a small business by enduring hardships."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on September 6, the Mid-Autumn Festival is approaching, which is the peak time for mooncake sales, but this year the market is particularly quiet. A sales manager of a mooncake OEM factory in Shenzhen said, "In previous years, the half month before the festival was the peak sales period, and business was the hottest. We shipped goods in the early morning. But this year, the number of orders has decreased significantly." Some mooncake OEM factories have started to work three days a week and rest one day due to lack of orders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, CCTV did not broadcast the World Cup qualifiers between China and Japan, but instead broadcast the recording of the Paris Paralympic Women's Wheelchair Basketball Tournament, where the Chinese team defeated Japan and advanced to the semi-finals. Netizens responded with "I am so happy to win"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Former central bank governor Yi Gang said at the Shanghai Bund Financial Summit on Friday that the country should focus on dealing with deflationary pressures, a rare admission by a prominent Chinese economist that falling prices are threatening its growth prospects.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5 report, Zhengzhou, Henan. A diabetic patient's blood sugar soared after drinking the popular "Russian imported milk powder". After investigation, the milk powder was actually non-dairy creamer beverage, produced in a simple hut, three or four yuan per pound, and sold for thirty or forty yuan after stirring with a wooden stick. A large number of orders were sent to all parts of the country every day. The guy drove a Mercedes-Benz, bought a new house, and became a groom-to-be in just one year by selling fake milk powder!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of September 5, the media reported that a woman was walking on Yoyogi 3-chome Street in Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan, when she was suddenly slashed by a 19-year-old Chinese man with a kitchen knife. The woman was injured on the back of her head and both hands.
According to the man, he did not know the victim and his motive for the crime was "kill if you want to kill"...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 6, Beijing. Petitioners outside the Supreme Court saw their leaders’ bus coming out and shouted in unison, “Unjust! Unjust!”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: News on September 5: China grants zero tariff treatment to 33 African countries!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5th is Tencent's "99 Charity Day" event, and some people in the system and parents received notices asking them to donate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, Weibo released the 31st issue of this week’s safety tips, in which a blogger was banned from posting harmful remarks about Africa and China-Africa relations.
